alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 21 at 11:44PM AKST until January 22 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW ACROSS THE CENTRAL PANHANDLE... .Snowfall continues across the panhandle. Dry snow will become wetter through the event with central-southern areas transitioning to rain. For northern areas, it is possible that snow lasts longer Monday night. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Gustavus, Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, and Pelican. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A spotter in Gustavus reported 6.25 inches of new snow as of Sunday night. Snow is expected to increase in water content through Monday and compact on the ground.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay
